Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Assignment immediately after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is directly followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in comparison to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment appears without being preceded by SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases where 'SW-Checklist Completed' does not happen

Name: Number of process variants in which SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurs exactly once
Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events that are part of variants ending in an acceptance decision (e.g., RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment relative to the total number of AE-related activities (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that are followed within 7 days by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Number of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is skipped entirely in the variant
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events occurring in manuscripts that later undergo major revision (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment compared to other \awaiting\ states such as SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-Awaiting AE Assignment that also include at least one reviewer invitation reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
